fields.answer: The performance of the MarineMap application is primarily dependent on 3 things: your computer, connection speed, and choice of browser. The easiest of those three that you can change is your browser. On Windows, Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome are both excellent choices. While Internet Explorer is supported, it is not a very good performer for web applications like MarineMap. On the Mac, Safari is fastest followed by Firefox.
fields.question: How can I make MarineMap run faster on my computer?
